revised_title: Elastohydrodynamic Lubrication of Point Contacts at Heavy Loads
tldr: The authors present a method to solve the elastohydrodynamic lubrication problem for point contacts at heavy loads using the inverse solution of the Reynolds equation. This method improves upon earlier solutions that were restricted to lighter loads. The study considers material combinations of steel-glass and steel-steel and provides solutions for film thickness and pressure distributions at high loads.
